text: The Statue is a 1913 comedy short directed by Allen Curtis. The film features Harry Fisher as the artist with Max Asher, Lee Morris and Doc Vinard.Couderc Les petits maitres du burlesque americain 1909-1929 2000 The film is unrelated to :fr:La Statue, a French silent film directed by Alice Guy in 1905. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1913 films Category:American films Category:1913 comedy films Category:1913 short films Category:Films scored by Riz Ortolani Category:American comedy films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Statue (1913 film)
